job_details.Functieomschrijving: The Linux team is continuously improving the current infrastructure landscape by automation and the use of new technologies. Besides ensuring excellent operations your activities will support the team in building and expanding (new) systems and platforms, enhancing existing infrastructure, the infra delivery to our internal customers, and carrying out life cycle management of systems and software., You will be part of the Cloud & Infrastructure Solutions team. This team of around 30 people is located in two locations. For this role working in either location (The Hague or Diemen) is possible. Together with your direct colleagues you will be responsible for managing several external suppliers responsible for infrastructure on the supply side and work with Delivery & contract managers, Product Owners and Project managers and the demand side.
job_details.full_text:
Linux Engineer

The Linux team is continuously improving the current infrastructure landscape by automation and the use of new technologies. Besides ensuring excellent operations your activities will support the team in building and expanding (new) systems and platforms, enhancing existing infrastructure, the infra delivery to our internal customers, and carrying out life cycle management of systems and software., You will be part of the Cloud & Infrastructure Solutions team. This team of around 30 people is located in two locations. For this role working in either location (The Hague or Diemen) is possible. Together with your direct colleagues you will be responsible for managing several external suppliers responsible for infrastructure on the supply side and work with Delivery & contract managers, Product Owners and Project managers and the demand side.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on Linux infrastructure management, automation, and system operations. It does not mention any specific AI, machine learning, or generative AI technologies, models, or frameworks. The role is primarily related to traditional infrastructure engineering and system administration, which falls outside the scope of ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profiles. Therefore, the 'Ambiguous' profile is the most appropriate.

job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes 'ensuring excellent operations', 'managing systems and platforms', and 'life cycle management of systems and software', which are core to operations engineering, albeit in a traditional infrastructure context rather than MLOps.
The mention of 'automation' and 'use of new technologies' in improving infrastructure aligns with the operational aspects of managing and enhancing systems.
job_tasks.phrase: automation and the use of new technologies

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'building and expanding (new) systems and platforms' and 'enhancing existing infrastructure' implies development and integration work within the infrastructure domain.
job_tasks.phrase: building and expanding (new) systems and platforms

job_tasks.justification: The role involves working with 'internal customers', 'Delivery & contract managers, Product Owners and Project managers', indicating a need to understand business needs and demands for infrastructure services.
job_tasks.phrase: infra delivery to our internal customers

soft_skills.phrase: work with Delivery & contract managers, Product Owners and Project managers
